name: baseliner-windows-core
description: MVP demo baseline: ensure Firefox is present and create a local marker file to prove script resources + reporting work end-to-end.

resources.name: Baseliner marker file
resources.remediate: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'C:\\ProgramData\\Baseliner' | Out-Null; Set-Content -Path 'C:\\ProgramData\\Baseliner\\mvp_marker.txt' -Value ('baseliner mvp marker ' + (Get-Date).ToString('o')); exit 0
